data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Panjshir, Afghanistan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Panjshir, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 27 believers in Panjshir to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6296 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Panjshir, Afghanistan to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Panjshir, Afghanistan to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Changgar people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Panjshir to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, please give the people in the state of Panjshir access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary:
the state of Panjshir, Afghanistan has a population of 170,000.

We estimate Panjshir has 27 people who might know Jesus, 5 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 169,968 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,296 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Panjshir. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

location.name: Panjshir
location.people_groups_list: Afghan, Tajik, Arab, Tajiki, Afshari, Bania (Muslim traditions), Aimaq
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Afghan, Tajik (10,585,000), Arab, Tajiki (18,000), Afshari (15,000), Bania (Muslim traditions) (6,400), Aimaq (1,595,000)
